alert.note: Alert for Ouray; San Miguel (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 11 at 3:34PM MDT until August 11 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Arroyo and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Colorado, including the following counties, Ouray and San Miguel. * WHEN...Until 645 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 332 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms east and northeast of Sawpit. This will cause arroyo and small stream flooding. Between 0.8 and 1.2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Sawpit, Fall Creek and Placerville, as well as Highway 145 from mile markers 71 to 90.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
